knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```


```{r}
gmpd <- read_csv(here("data", "GMPD", "GMPD_main.csv"))
```

```{r}
gmpd_host_para <- gmpd %>% dplyr::select(HostCorrectedName, ParasiteCorrectedName) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  mutate(pres = 1)

para_host_mat <- gmpd_host_para %>% pivot_wider(., names_from = HostCorrectedName, values_from = pres)

para_host_mat %<>% replace(is.na(.), 0)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(para_host_mat, file = here("data", "processed_data","para_mat.rds"))
```
